medical_history.chief_complaint: Large solitary skin nodule on right thigh.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 8 months prior to presentation, with a large skin tumor developing at that time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Father had a history of reticulum cell sarcoma of the intestine; mother and siblings have no known hematologic disorders.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of reticulum cell sarcoma; mother and all siblings healthy.
